name: The Stairwell Experiments
description:
Descend SCP-087, complete three experimental tasks for the SCP Foundation, avoid and deter SCP-087-1, and uncover the mystery behind the crying child lost deep in the stairwell.

A crying child can be heard in the depths of the stairwell...

The stairwell, however, appears to grow infinitely deep.

Only recent experimental breakthroughs by The SCP Foundation have made reaching the bottom possible.

Descend... Descend... Descend... Key Features
  • Modern visuals
  • Immersive sound design
  • Diverse, random, stairwell design
  • Interactive confrontation with SCP-087-1
The Story of How I Made This Game Press Kit/Media Pack

I organized screenshots and other images, and I made some transparent pngs. I hope it helps save time if you need to make a video thumbnail. : )

Just follow the link and you should see a download icon near the top of the page:

Stairwell Experiments Media Pack

~ changelog ~ 1.0.1
  • "play from" level selection on main menu now updates without requiring game restart
